name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Backend Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in developing scalable software solutions using **TypeScript**, **NodeJS**, **golang**, and distributed systems. I am proficient in both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, and have extensive experience working with **APIs**, including **GraphQL** and **REST**. I am adept at utilizing **Prisma Postgres**, **websocket**, and **etcd** for configuration management, while also being skilled in automation and deployment on **bare metal servers**. My strong communication and problem-solving abilities allow me to lead cross-functional teams effectively and mentor junior engineers. I emphasize technical excellence and prioritize user experience, performance, and innovation in every project I deliver, particularly in agile environments.
